trans-unit.source: ShowCase Query Result Provider depends on which server the UID belongs to: * MicroGG (Celestia and Irminsul server). * Enka Networks (All other servers).
trans-unit.target: 展櫃查詢結果由下述來源提供: * 天空島＆世界樹: MicroGG。 * 其餘區服: Enka Networks。

trans-unit.source: ShowCase Query Result Provider depends on which server the UID belongs to: * MiHoMo Origin (Celestia-AstralExpress and Irminsul-Nameless server). * Enka Networks (All other servers).
trans-unit.target: 展櫃查詢結果由下述來源提供: * 天空島(星穹列車)＆世界樹(無名客): MiHoMo Origin。 * 其餘區服: Enka Networks。

trans-unit.source: This set of ID photos might not be applicable under certain circumstances in this app. Also, a disclaimer: The Genshin-style character ID photos are **NOT from leaked character design assets from Hoyoverse / Cognosphere / MiHoYo**. Instead, these assets are rendered using [the MikuMikuDance models released by MiHoYo in public](https://www.aplaybox.com/u/516827875).
trans-unit.target: 這套證件照可能在該 App 內的某些場合下無法起作用。另附免責聲明：這套原神風格的角色證件照**並非出自內鬼洩漏的角色人設圖稿**，而是利用[米哈遊官方放出的 MMD 模型](https://www.aplaybox.com/u/516827875)渲染而成。

trans-unit.source: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Genshin Impact characters in this app are from Star Rail (excl. Geo, Dendro, and Hydro), representing the Teyvat Element of each character. These totems is visible only if “Use Namecard backgrounds for Genshin Characters’ ID Photos and ShowCase Build panels” is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 該應用內顯示的《原神》角色證件照的背景圖騰乃是為了彰顯該角色的元素能力屬性而設定。該圖騰素材取自《崩壞：星穹鐵道》（水、岩、草這三個屬性除外）。當「針對原神角色的證件照與面板啟用名片背景」選項停用時，背景圖騰才會顯現。

trans-unit.source: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Star Rail in this app are for representing both their life paths and their elemental powers. The element is represented by the color used for rendering the totem.
trans-unit.target: 該應用內顯示的《崩壞：星穹鐵道》角色證件照的背景圖騰乃是為了同時彰顯該角色的元素能力屬性與命途而設定。元素能力屬性體現在命途紋樣的配色上。

trans-unit.source: ID Photo Specimen for all characters
trans-unit.target: 全角色身分證件照樣本

trans-unit.source: Either no detail-exposable characters in the showcase or (in case of Genshin Impact) the UID owner didn't enable "Show Character Details" in the game. If you are the UID owner, you may follow the following screenshot to config the showcase in the game.
trans-unit.target: 展櫃中沒有可以顯示詳情的角色，或者（以《原神》為例）UID 擁有者沒有在遊戲中啟用「顯示角色詳情」。如果您是 UID 擁有者，可以按照下述遊戲畫面擷圖來配置遊戲中的展櫃。
評分時照顧任何雷系角色的超綻放配裝

trans-unit.source: Genshin Only. E.g.: Raiden Shogun with over-900 elemental master (and related 4-piece artifact sets) can team up with Baizhu, Furina, and Nahida to be the strongest full-auto guided remote hyperbloom team. This disobeys the initial character design of Raiden Shogun but is an acceptable and effective choice with significantly-reduced workload of building-up the entire team with significantly larger firing range than Shinobu-Yukuaki-based close-combat hyperbloom teams. Similar situations may apply to other electro characters in Genshin Impact.
trans-unit.target: 舉例：雷電將軍在堆有至少 900 點元素精通（且使用有助於超綻放的聖遺物套裝）的情況下可以與芙寧娜＆納西妲＆白朮組成最強的遠程全自動脫手超綻放陣容。該陣容違背了雷電將軍的數值模型，但培養角色所需的時間成本顯著降低、且擁有比以久岐忍＆行秋為核心的近戰超綻放陣容更遠的射程範圍。其餘雷系角色可能會有類似的情況。該選項對星穹鐵道角色無效。

trans-unit.source: Consider catalysis reactions triggered with anemo characters
trans-unit.target: 兼顧風系角色的擴散行為所啟動的超激化反應

trans-unit.source: Genshin Only. E.g.: Kaedehara Kazuha with 4-piece Thundering Fury artifact suite is now considered as an acceptable choice to trigger dendro catalysis. Similar situations may apply to other anemo characters in Genshin Impact.
trans-unit.target: 舉例：楓原萬葉持「如雷的盛怒」四件套可有效參與激化反應。其他的風系角色可能會有類似的情況。該選項對星穹鐵道角色無效。

trans-unit.target: 在角色面板畫面顯示聖遺物契合度評分

trans-unit.source: Error happened on inserting the imported gacha entries into the database.
trans-unit.target: 往資料庫內寫入正在匯入的抽卡記錄時出現錯誤。

trans-unit.source: GachaMetaDB is out of date for handling certain gacha item entries in either the local app gacha entry database or from external sources. This DB contains crucial info for mapping ItemIDs and their translations, plus telling the rarity type of each gacha item.
trans-unit.target: 這部裝置上的 GachaMetaDB 已經過期、無法正常用來處理來自該應用的本機資料庫或外部來源的某些抽卡物品條目。GachaMetaDB 資料庫包含了用以映射 ItemID 及其翻譯的重要資訊，且記載了每個抽卡物品的稀有等級查詢表。
本機 GachaMetaDB 快取已過期。

trans-unit.source: Empty results retrieved while trying to online-update GachaMetaDB.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試更新 GachaMetaDB 快取時，獲取到的資料是空的。

trans-unit.source: Failed from attempting to to online-update GachaMetaDB.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試更新 GachaMetaDB 快取時失敗。

trans-unit.source: This app does not contain paid gacha. The Gacha Record Manager in this app only allows users to manage their personal gacha records for some of the games supported by this app. // Your gacha records in this app will only be stored in the private iCloud space of your current Apple ID, as well as on any Apple devices that are signed in with that Apple ID and have this app installed and in-use, hence no privacy concerns needed. // Zenless Zone Zero is currently not supported by this feature.
trans-unit.target: 敝應用不包含付費轉蛋。該抽卡記錄管理功能僅允許使用者就「被敝應用所支援的部分遊戲」管理自己的個人抽卡（轉蛋）記錄。您的抽卡記錄僅會存儲在您當前的 Apple ID 的私有 iCloud 空間內、以及任何登入了該 Apple ID 且有安裝使用敝應用的 Apple 裝置，不會有隱私上的安全問題。敝應用的抽卡記錄管理功能現階段不提供對絕區零的支援。

trans-unit.source: [ParseGachaURLError] The version info of `key` is missing in the authentication key.
trans-unit.target: [ParseGachaURLError] 認證用密鑰版本資訊缺失。
[ParseGachaURLError] 沒能成功生成抽卡 URL。

trans-unit.target: 返回且選擇其他的檔案

trans-unit.target: 請指定要匯入的抽卡記錄檔案。 若沒有選中的持有者的話，則會被視為匯入全部持有者的抽卡記錄檔案。

trans-unit.source: Successfully dumped the exchangeable gacha records file to:
trans-unit.target: 可交換型抽卡記錄檔案已成功匯出至:

trans-unit.source: Successfully dumped the exchangeable gacha records file.
trans-unit.target: 可交換型抽卡記錄檔案已成功匯出。

trans-unit.source: GIGF (Genshin Impact Gacha-Exchangeable Format) indicates UIGF v3.0 and earlier. The feature of importing these obsolete formats is only considered for importing old backup files generated by this app.
trans-unit.target: GIGF（原神專用抽卡記錄交換格式）是對 UIGF v3.0 及更早版本的 UIGF 的統稱。這些版本的規格已經被全部淘汰。對已淘汰規格的匯入支援僅為滿足使用者匯入既有備份資料之目的。

trans-unit.source: This app does not support importing GIGF formats older than UIGF v2.0 due to the lack of too many crucial information fields.
trans-unit.target: 敝 App 無法支援對比 UIGF v2.0 更早的 GIGF 格式的匯入，因為欠缺了太多的關鍵資訊。

trans-unit.source: ⚠︎ UIGF v2.3 (and earlier) JSON files & UIGF v2.2 Excel Spreadsheets are exported without timezone information, and the apps used for generating these files may have individual behaviors in handling timezone information. - For such files generated by Snap Hutao (v1.7.16_2023-11-10 and earlier) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to UTC+0. - For such files generated by Xunkong (v1.4.4_2024-04-24) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to the server time zone. Xunkong provided no UIGF v2.4 support and they introduced the gacha timezone support with UIGF v3.0 support starts from v1.5.0 update on 2024-09-21. - For such files generated by Teyvat Helper (YShelper), please set the fallback time to the device time where this file was generated and exported by Teyvat Helper.
trans-unit.target: ⚠︎ UIGF v2.3 及之前的規格的 JSON 檔案 / Excel 試算簿不包含有效的時區資訊，且每一款 App 在匯出這些舊版規格的檔案時對時區的處理規則各有差異。 - 如果您嘗試匯入用「Snap.HuTao」舊版(v1.7.16_2023-11-10 為止的版本) 匯出的這些舊規格的抽卡記錄的話，請將時區缺省值設定為 UTC+0。 - 如果您嘗試匯入用「尋空」舊版 (v1.4.4_2024-04-24) 匯出的這些舊規格的抽卡記錄的話，請將時區缺省值設定為伺服器時區。「尋空」未曾提供過對 UIGF v2.4 的支援，且從 v1.5.0 版 (2024-09-21) 開始才同時提供了對抽卡時區與 UIGF v3.0 的支援。 - 如果您嘗試匯入由「提瓦特小助手 (YShelper)」匯出的這些舊規格的抽卡記錄的話，請將缺省值設定為當初用以匯出該檔案時的裝置的系統時區。

trans-unit.source: SRGF v1.0, established by the UIGF committee, is an exchangeable format for gacha records of Star Rail, a game produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo. Although this format is marked as a vintage format and is replaced by UIGF v4.0, there are some excellent apps on Windows which only conforms to SRGF v1.0, hence the option here for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: SRGF v1.0 是由 UIGF 委員會制定的資訊交換格式，用於 Cognosphere 和米哈遊製作的《星穹鐵道》遊戲的抽卡記錄。雖然此格式被標記為舊版本，並被 UIGF v4.0 取代，但兩者之間可以進行無損的雙向轉換。此外，Windows 平台上有一些只支持 SRGF v1.0 的優秀應用，因此這裡提供了兼容性選項。

trans-unit.source: UIGF v4.0, established by the UIGF committee, is a coalescent exchangeable format for gacha records of many games produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo.
trans-unit.target: UIGF v4.0 是由 UIGF 委員會制定的聚合型資訊交換格式，用於多款由 Cognosphere 和米哈遊製作發行的的電玩們的抽卡記錄的交換。

trans-unit.source: Successfully imported all entries from the specified profile(s) of the given file.
trans-unit.target: 已成功從指定的檔案匯入了指定的抽卡所有者的全部的抽卡記錄。

trans-unit.source: Due to occasional server-side accidents, the game server may return duplicated gacha entries with incorrect transaction IDs, polluting the local database. If the bleaching mode is enabled, this app will use the latest fetch results as the trust source of correct transaction IDs and remove the incorrect entries on the local side, but this can be deceived by the polluted data from the game server. Nevertheless, as long as a game version deprecates, all gacha records during its operation period will become static and trustable.
trans-unit.target: 由於遊戲伺服器端偶發的故障，伺服器回傳的抽卡記錄資料可能會重複、或帶有錯誤的流水號，造成本機資料庫被污染的情況。如果啟用「清理既存的異常記錄」，敝應用將始終以最新獲取的抽卡記錄作為依據、來判斷本機資料庫的資料的流水號是否正確、據此篩除可能的錯誤資料。但這個過程可能會因為這個污染現象而被誤導。無論如何，某個遊戲版本在結束營運時，營運期間的所有抽卡記錄都會在伺服器端被固定下來、成為可信結果。

trans-unit.source: Local database can get polluted? Why?
trans-unit.target: 為什麼本機資料庫會被污染？

trans-unit.source: ⚠︎ You are responsible for the backup of existing data records before proceeding the fetch.
trans-unit.target: ⚠︎ 您有責任在獲取抽卡記錄之前主動備份本機資料。

trans-unit.target: - 專案創始人＆專案總監 - 程式師（統一披薩小助手 v5） - 程式師（原神披薩小助手 v1-v4） - 程式師（星鐵披薩小助手） - 公關（中國內陸）

trans-unit.source: - Engine Architect & Dev, The Pizza Helper (v5) - Maintainer, Pizza Helper for HSR - Maintainer, Pizza Helper for Genshin (v3-v4)
trans-unit.target: - 引擎架構師＆程式師（統一披薩小助手 v5） - 參與維護（原神披薩小助手 v3-v4） - 參與維護（星鐵披薩小助手）

trans-unit.source: The primary languages of this app are English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Japanese. All other languages are secondary, as no one in the development team can fluently understand or use them. We rely on ChatGPT to create draft translations for these languages, and we warmly welcome volunteers who wish to help improve them. Having a Mac with Xcode 16 (or a later version) installed will make it much easier for contributors to participate.
trans-unit.target: 敝應用的主要語言為英文、繁體中文、簡體中文及日文。其他語言屬次要語言，因為開發團隊中無人能理解或使用這些語言。我們使用 ChatGPT 為這些語言準備了一份翻譯草稿，並歡迎有志之士協助改善翻譯。若參加者擁有安裝了 Xcode 16（或更新版本）的 Mac 電腦，將會大幅簡化翻譯作業。
某個免費自由軟體開發團體。

trans-unit.source: - The successor of both PizzaHelper4Genshin and PizzaHelper4HSR. Powered by the next-generation United Pizza Engine. - The program part of this software is open-sourced under AGPLv3 License. - The Pizza Helper and its predecessors are not affiliated with miHoYo Co., Ltd. nor its subsidiaries. - The game contents and materials of the following titles are trademarks and copyrights of miHoYo Co., Ltd.: “Star Rail (HSR)”, “Genshin Impact”, “Zenless Zone Zero”.
trans-unit.target: - 是「原神披薩小助手」與「星鐵披薩小助手」的繼任者，受次世代「統一披薩引擎」的加持。 - 敝應用的程式部分以 AGPLv3 許可證釋出原始程式碼。 - 披薩小助手及其前身與米哈遊股份有限公司（及其子公司）無牽涉。 - 下述遊戲的商標與內容材料均歸米哈遊股份有限公司所有：《原神》《崩壞：星穹鐵道》《絕區零》。

trans-unit.source: A good utility for every Sensei.
Deprecated and integrated into The Pizza Helper.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰。相關功能被併入以統一披薩引擎加持的披薩小助手。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated and integrated into The Pizza Helper.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰。相關功能被併入以統一披薩引擎加持的披薩小助手。

trans-unit.source: Click here to fetch more results.
trans-unit.target: 點此請求更多檢索結果
沒有結果。換一個詞試試。

trans-unit.source: Type some keywords to start a query.
trans-unit.target: 請鍵入要檢索的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Please wait for the data to sync from iCloud. If you are on TestFlight, you probably have to force-push the local profiles to this watch from the iOS version of this app.
trans-unit.target: 請等待帳號從iCloud同步。如果您使用的是 TestFlight 版本的話，您可能需要藉由敝應用的 iOS 版強制向當前手錶推送本機帳號資料。

trans-unit.source: Please go to the Settings Page to check possible connectivity issues with this local profile.
trans-unit.target: 請前往 App 設定頁面檢查該本機帳號的網路連線故障。

trans-unit.note: Only one or two characters are allowed.

trans-unit.source: No local profile found on this device. You may switch to the App Settings page and add one. :)
trans-unit.target: 尚未發現本機帳號。請前往 App 設定頁面新增一個本機帳號。

trans-unit.source:
New UI language settings of an app on macOS / iOS always require the app to restart to make sure the new language setting becomes effective to it. Even if the user manually change this through System Settings, user will still be prompted the necessity of restarting the app, and it will be not this app but the macOS / iOS who prompts it.
We make this language switcher here to save users some seconds. This design is extremely ADHD-friendly since ADHD patients are likely to forgot what they are about to do while flipping among nested pages in iOS / macOS System Settings.
This app will quit after you confirm this message.
trans-unit.target:
在 macOS/iOS 上更改應用程式的 UI 語言設定時，應用程式需要重新啟動，以確保新的語言設定生效。即使使用者透過系統設定手動更改語言設定，仍然會提示需要重新啟動應用程式，且屆時這個提示將由 macOS/iOS 系統來發出，而非敝應用程式。
我們在這裡設置了語言切換器，以幫助使用者節省幾秒鐘的時間。這種設計對於有注意力缺陷渙散障礙（ADHD）患者非常友善，因為 ADHD 患者在翻閱 iOS/macOS 系統設定中的多層頁面時，往往容易徹底忘記他們原本要做的事情。
確認此訊息後，應用程式將會退出。

trans-unit.source: The fetched inventory result is empty.
trans-unit.target: 獲取到的角色庫存清單是空的。

trans-unit.source: Tap here to see previously cached results.
trans-unit.target: 點擊這裡查看最近的暫存結果。

trans-unit.source: ⚠︎ Zenless Zone Zero UIDs governed by Miyoushe require the user to manually fill in his / her device fingerprint by himself / herself.
trans-unit.target: ⚠︎ 如果您的絕區零 UID 受米游社管轄的話，您需要自備設備指紋。
登入您的 HoYoLAB / 米遊社帳號

trans-unit.source: Tap the QR code above to save it
trans-unit.target: 點按該 QR Code 以保存

trans-unit.source: Please use MiYouShe app to scan the QR code. You may also want to screenshot this QR code for the scanning.
trans-unit.target: 請使用米遊社 App 掃描該 QR Code。您也可以將該 QR Code 用螢幕擷圖的方式存下來掃描。

trans-unit.source: Server response indicates that the QR code has not been scanned. Please try scanning it again or regenerate a new QR code for scanning.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器回傳訊息指出該 QR Code 尚未被掃描。請重新嘗試掃描、或者重新生成新的 QR Code 再嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Click here to jump to Miyoushe

trans-unit.target: 藉由 App Store 獲取米遊社應用

trans-unit.source: Login by scanning the QR code
trans-unit.target: 藉由 QR Code 掃描的方式登入

trans-unit.source: To get resin and other data from HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, UID and login cookie of your account is needed. After logging into HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, we will store them locally as well as on your private iCloud. Then our app will use the stored UID and cookie to get the resin and other information in a way similar to HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app, then display them on your widget. Your private information will not be sent to other places other than HoYoLAB / Miyoushe and iCloud, including us, so your personal information will be very secure. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program.
trans-unit.target: 為了請求您的遊戲內的資料，我們需要獲取您的 UID 和 Cookie，這是獲取資料的必要參數。您在接下來的網頁登入後，我們會在本機和 iCloud 存儲您的個人資料。然後我們通過類似米遊社 / HoYoLAB 的方式獲取您的遊戲內的資料。您的個人資訊不會傳送給任何人，包括我們自己。您的個人資訊將會是非常安全的。敝軟體是開放原始碼軟體，每個人都可以檢查和監督敝軟體的全部底層行為。

trans-unit.source: This procedure is not an illegal procedure such as plug-ins. This program abides by the relevant content of miHoYo's secondary creation rules. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program. For details, see Settings - FAQ.
trans-unit.target: 敝軟體不屬於外掛等違法程式。敝軟體遵守米哈遊二次創作規則的相關內容。敝軟體是開放原始碼程式，每個人都可以檢查和監督敝軟體的全部底層行為。具體內容參見「設定 - FAQ」章節。
關於敝應用的工作原理

trans-unit.source: Click the "Done" button at the top-trailing corner of the app screen after you finish login to HoYoLAB in the following webpage. If you are prompted for CAPTCHA, please finish it.
trans-unit.target: 請在打開的網頁完成登入 HoYoLab 操作後點擊「完成」。如果彈出人機驗證的話，請完成之。

trans-unit.source: To ensure you feel safe with this, here’s how it works: Your password input is protected by macOS built-in SecureEventInputAPI (or its equivalent on iOS), and then it will be directly handled by HoYoLAB login webpage. This is the nature of how WKWebView gets designed by Apple. Nobody else can interfere / intercept this process, nor this app. You can see that you cannot switch to 3rd-party input methods while the password is receiving inputs from the user.
trans-unit.target: 為了確保您對此感到安全，這裡介紹一下運作方式：您的密碼輸入受到 macOS 內建的 SecureEventInputAPI（或 iOS 上的等效功能）的保護，然後將直接由 HoYoLAB 登入網頁處理。這是 Apple 對 WKWebView 的設計使然。其他人無法幹擾或截聽這個過程，包括敝應用。您會發現，在密碼接收來自使用者的輸入的過程中，您無法切換到第三方輸入法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ 3rd-party sign-in services like Google, Facebook, Twitter, Sign-in-with-Apple, etc. ARE NOT TECHNICALLY SUPPORTABLE IN THIS APP, please sign in with your username & password.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ 通過 Google，Facebook，Twitter 或 Sign-in-with-Apple 等第三方服務登入 HoYoLAB 的方式不受敝 App支援，請使用帳號密碼登入。

trans-unit.source:
Beware of these things before you proceed:
→ This app is NOT made for the creation nor deletion of HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account. Such actions are supposed to be done through HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app or official website services provided by MiHoYo / Cognosphere. You may tap the management link (see the top-trailing corner of this window) to proceed to that website service page.
→ A HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account must have been used to play the game (you specified above) AT LEAST ONCE in order to be usable in this app.
→ A related game account (under the managment of its related HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account) must enable the public visibility of the character showcase through in-game settings in order to let the related information displayable in this app.
trans-unit.target:
有幾點需要您事先知悉的事項：
→ 敝 App 無法用來完成米遊社 / HoYoLAB 新帳號的註冊與刪除。這類流程得通過米遊社 / HoYoLAB App 等由 MiHoYo / Cognosphere 官方提供的相關服務來完成（可參見當前畫面右上角的管理鏈接）。
→ 任何用於敝 App 的米遊社 / HoYoLAB 新帳號均已經至少用來遊玩過該遊戲（您在上文親自指定的遊戲），否則在技術上無法用於敝 App。
→ 任何用於敝 App 的米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號下的遊戲帳號，除非手動在遊戲內啟用展櫃等相關內容的公開顯示，否則敝 App 無權顯示相關內容。

trans-unit.target: 因下述資料尚未記入，本機帳號資料保存失敗：

trans-unit.source: Failed from saving profile due to error:
trans-unit.target: 本機帳號資料保存失敗，原因：

trans-unit.target: 本機帳號沒能成功匯出。

trans-unit.target: 所有的本機帳號已成功打包匯出至:
所有的本機帳號已成功打包匯出。

trans-unit.source: Import a Pack of Local Profiles

trans-unit.target: 匯入舊版 App 的本機帳號

trans-unit.source: This HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account is not bound to any game character.
trans-unit.target: 該米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號未綁定遊戲角色。
手動設定您的本機帳號

trans-unit.source: Sorry, login feature for this server is temporarily down. We are working on this. You can now manually config your local profile with your own effective Miyoushe / HoYoLAB Cookie.
trans-unit.target: 抱歉，該伺服器的登入功能暫時無法使用。我們正在努力尋求解決方案。目前您仍可以藉由「自行填寫有效的米遊社 / HoYoLAB Cookie」的方式來手動登入。

trans-unit.source: No UIDs found against the specified game. This HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account is required to play the game for at least once before being logged in via this app against this game.
trans-unit.target: 在這個 HoYoLAB / 米遊社帳號內沒有找到與該遊戲對應的 UID。該帳號必須至少用來遊玩一次該遊戲，否則便沒有在敝 App 內「作為這個遊戲的帳號來使用」的意義。
手動將本機帳號同步至小工具

trans-unit.source: To avoid consistently being requested for verification, please set up device finger print according to [this tutorial](https://hsr.pizzastudio.org/static/fp_tutorial).
trans-unit.target: 如果持續要求人機驗證的話，建議參考[該教學指引](https://hsr.pizzastudio.org/static/fp_tutorial)抓包填入設備指紋、以規避該故障。

trans-unit.source: Please tap here to finish the captcha verification.
trans-unit.target: 請點擊這裡完成人機驗證

trans-unit.source: Regarding how to Manage or Delete your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account
trans-unit.target: 瞭解如何對 米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號進行 管理 或 註銷(刪號)

trans-unit.source: The above link guides you to: %@
The above link works on all devices. Users can also use HoYoLAB App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).
trans-unit.target: HoYoLAB 帳號的註銷可藉由任何裝置使用上述鏈接來完成，也可以使用 HoYoLAB 的 App 來完成。

trans-unit.source:
Miyoushe expects that users need to use either cellphone or Miyoushe App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).
If you are on macOS, you can change the user-agent of your Safari browser to iPhone in order to see the account deletion link. For more information regarding how to use the developer menu in Safari on macOS to change its user-agent, please contact Apple Support.
The above link, if directly clicked, will automatically apply the user-agent of iPhone.
trans-unit.target:
米遊社期望使用者藉由手機或米遊社 App（iPhone）來完成帳號註銷（刪除）。
如果您使用的是 macOS，則可以將 Safari 瀏覽器的使用者代理（UA, User-Agent）變更為 iPhone，以便看到帳號刪除專用鏈接入口。有關如何使用 macOS 上 Safari 中的開發者選單更改其使用者代理的方法，請聯絡 Apple 支援。
在敝 App 內直接點按上述鏈接的話，會在前往該頁面時自動套用 iPhone 的使用者代理（UA）。

trans-unit.source: You acknowledge and agree that as a result of deleting your Account, you will lose access to all services related to all games developed by MiHoYo / Cognosphere, including the account information, subscriptions and all game-related information linked to such Account and permanently lose the possibility to access other services through the Account.
trans-unit.target: 您認可並同意帳號註銷導致的後果：您將無法藉由該帳號登入（任何由米哈遊 / Cognosphere 開發的）遊戲相關服務，包括與該帳號相關聯的帳號資訊、訂閱和遊戲的相關資訊，並永久喪失任何藉由該帳號存取其他服務的權利。

trans-unit.source: You may confirm this consequence by consulting HoYoLAB / Miyoushe support.
trans-unit.target: 您可自行向米遊社 / HoYoLAB 客戶服務確認上述後果是否真實。

trans-unit.source: This page is made in compliance with what requested by App Store Review Board.
trans-unit.target: 該頁面乃應 App Store 審委會之要求而實作。
在 App 啟動時，還原之前的頁簽

trans-unit.source: Force-push your local profiles to paired Apple Watch
trans-unit.target: 將本機帳號全部推送至已配對的 Apple Watch

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the synchronization-via-iCloud feature defects on your Apple Watch.
trans-unit.target: 在您的 Apple Watch 上無法藉由 iCloud 同步本機帳號時，得使用該功能。

trans-unit.source: Successfully retrieved the following local profiles from iOS device:
trans-unit.target: 成功從 iOS 裝置接收到下述本機帳號:

trans-unit.source: This requires restarting the app to take full effect.
trans-unit.target: 該設定的變更需要重新啟動 App 方可生效。

trans-unit.source: The TimeZone settings in this section is for displaying at least the following information (of Genshin Impact): Abyss Rank Statistics, Daily Material, Official In-Game Events, etc.
trans-unit.target: 該時區設定僅用於正確顯示至少下述通用原神資訊：深境螺旋排行榜、每日材料、官方遊戲活動，等。

trans-unit.source: TimeZone for displaying GI universal information
trans-unit.target: 原神通用資訊顯示專用時區

trans-unit.source: This includes Daily Task (Genshin Impact), Daily Training (Star Rail), and Vitality (Zenless Zone Zero).
trans-unit.target: 這包括了原神的每日委託、星穹鐵道的每日實訓、絕區零的活躍度。
每日委託完成狀況報告

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Due to a limitation in the UIKit-to-AppKit bridge framework, the DatePicker on macOS doesn’t show the input panel in macCatalyst apps. Users can only select the desired input field and type it directly on physical keyboard.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ 由於 UIKit 到 AppKit 橋接框架的限制，macCatalyst 應用中的 macOS 日期選擇器不會顯示輸入面板。使用者只能手動選擇所需的輸入欄位，並直接在實體鍵盤上輸入。

trans-unit.source: * Genshin Impact and Star Rail only.

trans-unit.target: 派遣委託完成狀況提醒

trans-unit.source: This app or its widgets will attempt to automatically reschedule relevant notifications when retrieving Real-Time Note data for a specific local profile. During each scheduling, it will proactively try to clear any previously scheduled, unreasonable, and unsent notifications made for this local profile. Notifications will only be scheduled if the system settings allow the app to send system notifications, and if the app has successfully retrieved real-time note data, in cases where the relevant preferences permit it.
trans-unit.target: 敝 App 或其隨贈的小工具會嘗試在針對某個本機帳號獲取實時便箋資訊時自動重新排定相關的通知。在每次排定時，都會嘗試主動清除之前針對該本機帳號所排定的任何不合理的尚未推送的通知。當且僅當系統設定允許敝 App 推送系統通知、且敝 App 有成功獲取到實時便箋資訊時，才會在相關的偏好設定允許的情況下對相關的通知進行排定。
參數質變儀可用狀況提醒
徵討之花剩餘樹脂折扣次數提醒

trans-unit.source: Remaining Echo of War Rewards Left
trans-unit.target: 歷戰餘響剩餘獎勳次數提醒

trans-unit.source: This app is not yet authorized in system settings to push notifications.
trans-unit.target: 敝應用尚需系統開放通知權限。
凱瑟琳獎勵可領取狀況提醒

trans-unit.source: You may also toggle it in the local profile manager.
trans-unit.target: 本機帳號管理器畫面也可修改上述設定。
對每個本機帳號的通知開關

trans-unit.note: This is the short form of `settings.notification.profilesReceivingNotifications.navTitle`. Please do consider its length since iPhone screen width is pretty narrow.

trans-unit.source: This includes Original Resin (Genshin Impact), Trailblaze Power (Star Rail), and Vitality (Zenless Zone Zero). Despite the threshold settings, You will also be notified if the player stamina is fully charged.
trans-unit.target: 這包括了原神的原粹樹脂、星穹鐵道的開拓力、絕區零的絕區電量。除了基於閾值的通知以外，也還會有玩家體力的滿載通知。

trans-unit.source: You will also be notified if the player stamina is fully charged.
trans-unit.target: 除此之外，也還會有玩家體力的滿載通知。
您無法重複添加相同的閾值。

trans-unit.source: Halt submission to HutaoDB until username is filled here
trans-unit.target: 在此處填寫使用者名稱之前，停止提交至 HutaoDB

trans-unit.source: Snap Hutao may release some benefits to a user if the username field here is correctly supplied in the uploaded battle report. Snap Hutao reserves the rights to explain the further details. If the enforcer toggle is ON, your battle reports will be uploaded to HutaoDB **only if** the username field is **not** blank.
trans-unit.target: 若您在上傳個人戰報時已填寫此處的「使用者名稱」欄位，Snap Hutao 可能會為您提供專屬福利。Snap Hutao 對此保留最終解釋權。請注意，開啟了此處的強制開關之後，只有在您填寫了「使用者名稱」的情況下，您的個人戰報才可能會上傳到 HutaoDB。

trans-unit.source: Allow to Collect Spiral Abyss Battle Reports Data
trans-unit.target: 允許收集深境螺旋個人戰報資料

trans-unit.source: We are looking forward to collect the Genshin characters you own and you used in the Spiral Abyss and send them to Snap.Hutao Database (i.e. HutaoDB) and Pizza DB. Allowing us to collect the data will help HutaoDB & PizzaAbyssDB to supply more-accurate information of the real-time Spiral Abyss Chacacter Usage Rate, Team Usage Rate, etc. information available-to-watch in the App. The information also consists of the related in-game Genshin UID but no other of your game account information to help HutaoDB potentially refuse forged records from identified cheaters.
trans-unit.target: 我們希望能將您已擁有的角色和在攻克深境螺旋時使用的角色資訊打包上傳給 Snap.Hutao 深淵資料庫（簡稱「HutaoDB」）以及披薩深淵資料庫（PizzaAbyssDB）。您對此的准許將會使得 HutaoDB 和 PizzaAbyssDB 能提供更準確的深境螺旋角色使用率、隊伍使用率等情況（均可以藉由敝 App 檢閱）。該上傳資料也包含對應的原神 UID，但不會包括其他的原神帳號資料。對 UID 的收集有助於 HutaoDB 永久拒絕來自作弊玩家的戰報資料遞交。

trans-unit.source: Tap here to read the FAQs about it.
trans-unit.target: 點此檢閱與此有關的常見問題解答。
自動去除重複的本機帳號

trans-unit.source:
⚠️ Please do not touch this toggle unless being told by the developers to do that while seeking for technical help.
⚠️ Please EXPORT your local profiles PRIOR TO touching this toggle.
trans-unit.target:
⚠️ 除非開發人員在您尋求技術協助時指示您這樣做，否則請勿觸摸此開關。
⚠️ 請在觸摸此開關之前匯出您的本機帳號。

trans-unit.source:
SwiftData does not support changing the location of a database container while it is being used, hence the necessity of restarting the app.
The app will restart after you confirm this message.
trans-unit.target:
SwiftData 不支援在使用資料庫容器時更改其位置，因此需要重新啟動應用程式。
確認此訊息後，應用程式將重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: Import all UIDs of these games from this account
trans-unit.target: 一次性匯入該帳號下的這幾款遊戲的所有區服的 UID

trans-unit.source: This option is extremely helpful to let the server know that you are really using your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account on your own devices. Individual logins per UID for each game and each game-server may let the HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account server misunderstood how many device this HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account gets logged into, leading to earlier expiration of your cookies. If profile duplication happens during this process, then the existing profile will be updated instead with new cookie, the latest device fingerprint, and the latest device ID instead.
trans-unit.target: 此選項非常有助於讓伺服器知道您確實是在自己的裝置上使用您的米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號。相同的米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號下的每個遊戲每個 UID 每個區服都登入一次的話，可能會讓米遊社 / HoYoLAB 伺服器誤解此帳號登入了多少裝置，導致 Cookie 提前失效。在這個讀入過程中，如果發現與既存的本機帳號重複的情況的話，則不再新增重複的帳號，而是將既有帳號的 Cookies、設備指紋、設備 ID 更新為最新的版本。
重新登入米遊社 / HoYoLAB 通行證

trans-unit.source: Automatically initiate Stamina Timer Live Activity
trans-unit.target: 自動發起玩家體力計時器的即時動態

trans-unit.source: You can slide the Dynamic Island from left / right to the middle to hide it. Swipe left on the Stamina Timer on the lock screen to turn off the resin timer and the Dynamic Island.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將動態島從左邊或右邊滑動至中間以隱藏它。 在鎖定畫面上向左滑動玩家體力計時器，即可關閉玩家體力計時器和動態島。

trans-unit.source: Stamina Timer is how this app utilizes the Live Activity feature of the iOS. You can click the ellipsis circle to the right of the Real-Time Note of a local profile in the Today tab to initiate it.
trans-unit.target: 玩家體力計時器依賴iOS的即時動態功能來運作。您可以點擊今日頁籤下的任一本機帳號的實時便箋旁邊的三個點圓圈來啟動它。

trans-unit.source: Go to System Settings to enable Live Activity for this app
trans-unit.target: 前往系統設定以啟用敝 App 的即時動態

trans-unit.source: Live Activity for this app is not permitted by the system
trans-unit.target: 系統尚未准許本 App 的即時動態權限
以玻璃材質為背景圖像
管理這部裝置上的本機帳號
該樓層的挑戰已被略過。

trans-unit.source: ⚠︎ The upload of personal battle reports to HutaoDB is suspended until the Snap Hutao-related options in the Privacy Settings of this app are correctly configured.
trans-unit.target: ⚠︎ 個人戰報上傳至 HutaoDB 的操作已暫停，直至敝 App 的隱私權設定當中的與 Snap Hutao 有關的選項被正確配置。

trans-unit.target: [HoYoAPI 錯誤] Cookie 尚未包含設備指紋資料、或相關資料失效。

trans-unit.target: 米遊社 / HoYoLAB 帳號設定內的資料公開權限不足。

trans-unit.source: [HoYoAPIErr] STokenV2 is either wrecked or missing from the stored cookie.

[HoYoAPI 錯誤] 需要人機驗證。
